title: Stuck in transfer
body:
Hello, i was transferring my main account to eu west from eune cause most of my friends are playing there. But now its stuck in transfer and i cant log in to the account. Is there someone that can help me?

Summoners name: EMILSEN

replies.body: That's strange!  This is happening after changing your login region to EUW?  If that's the case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our account team can take a look and make sure your transfer goes through.  We'll see you there!
Yes i changed it to euw, is there anyway to get it done today? Im at a lan today and cant play on my only lvl 30acc.. tickets usually take some time..
Tickets are responded in the order received.  Toss in that ticket first, and I'll see if we can do anything!  No guarantees, but LANs are important yo!
Do i send a ticket from this account then? Cause i cant log in to my main account cause it says there is no account with the username and pw on eune, and i still cant log in on euw..

Yeah that's fine!  You can also use an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which allows you to submit your own address, or just email us directly via support@riotgames.com.

Is there anything you could do? Did submit an account recovery ticket but couldnt remember everything that was asked for since its many years since i created the account. No response from either the email i sendt and the ticket. Really dont want to play without runes, masterys or any champs:((
I can check into this for you.  Did you get a ticket number after your submission, so I can look up your ticket?  Or what summoner name did you submit your info as?

The summoners name is: EMILSEN

Dont know if its the ticket number but got this on my mail after i submitted it.

Thanks for contacting our Player Support Team! We received your request (#30829568) .
I was supposed to get a option to create a new username on eu west cause the one i had was occupied, but i didnt get that option.

Thanks!  Your ticket has been received!  I looked into this for you and I do see that the transfer was successful.  If you were on EUW before, you probably didn't get a prompt for a new username because it's using an old one you already had before on EUW.  If you recall any previous usernames, give it a go and let me know if that helps.
My brother had apparently played on my account on eu west when i had a break from gaming, but he dont remember the username. What should i do?
Found out the username and password via forgotten username and password, and can now log in, thank you very much for your help buddy<3

Ah.  :/  You should get him to make his own account so cases like that doesn't happen, and it's tough to assist if other users other than the owner are involved.  Not to worry, though, since you already filled out a recovery form our account team will be able to check things out.  They'll get back to you as soon as they can, good luck!
